p: (4) Change of the Anions. Insertions of the BF 4 − anion instead of the usual Br − anion (comp. 11 versus comp. 10) lead to an increase in basal toxicity—1053 and 1482 mg/kg, respectively—but a decrease in cytotoxicity on HT-1080 (around 30 μg/ml and 3 μg/ml, respectively) and MH-22A (30 μg/ml and 3–6 μg/ml, respectively) cell lines.
